tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Nice doctor, friendly nature, ** ***** ********* ** *** *********** explain all issues very well,location of her clinic is easily accessible.
She took proper measures to avoid the infections during the check up of my child.
Today I recommended this Doctor to my friend for paediatric care of his child.

review: Doctor explained the issue in detail and answered all the queries. Really satisfied with the interaction.

review: She is very friendly and understand our concern as a parent towards the child.she explain each and every thing and respond to each query in a very positive and calm way.

review: She is our family paediatrician we all love her , her touch only can make any baby calm. Whatever injection or medicine she prescribed she explain the detail in ref why this & what all benefits it can come to.

review: very polite, explain each and every condition which we have to take care for my kid.Thanks a lot Doctor.

review: I strongly feel that Dr Deepika Gulati is sort of ideal pediatrician. She takes time actually listen to my concerns. She is thorough and proactive.*** **** ************ ** **** **** **** *******
